pkgmetadata.longdescription: PXES is a mini-distribution designed to build thin clients. It consists of precompiled binaries (the distribution part) and a gtk+ front-end used for configuring your images. PXES can be used to create PXE-bootable images, etherboot images, or bootable ISO images for thin clients. This version support RDP, Citrix, LTSP, XDMCP, and local sessions.
